= How to configure a Dev Environment =

  # [http://www.eclipse.org/rap/downloads/ Download]and install current Eclipse for RCP/RAP Development.
  # Install RAP Target. When Eclipse restarts, install RAP Target Platform from welcome screen.
  # Install Subversive Plugin.
  # Checkout projects from wind-platform

Simple like that!
